Text: How is it possible that the spoken language is English, since I know for a fact that this is a French-spoken film? Dual audio?
Is het nou Engels of Frans....? English / French please....what the F... is it?
This is indeed a French film. I've found English subtitles for it: http://subscene.com/The-First-Day-of-the-Rest-of-Your-Life-Le-Premier-Jour-du-reste-de-ta-vie/subtitles-76008.aspx
